titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 20th anniversary of the opening of the American Visionary Art Museum.
A resolution commemorating the 20th anniversary of the opening of the American Visionary Art Museum.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commemorates the 20th anniversary of the opening of the American Visionary Art Museum in Baltimore, Maryland.
Reaffirms that visionary art is a rare and valuable national treasure to which individuals in the United States should devote attention, support, and resources to ensure it is collected, preserved, and understood.
